[vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1519393801789{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][gt3_spacing height=”83px”][vc_custom_heading text=”MICROBLADING” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:left|color:%23fb90b1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][vc_custom_heading text=”3d Microblading EyeBrows Manual Hair Technique” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23202020|line_height:1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][gt3_spacing height=”16px”][vc_single_image image=”2338″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1522222141860{margin-bottom: -7px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][gt3_spacing height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Eyebrow microblading is the art of creating fuller thicker eyebrows through the use if a manual tatoo technique[/vc_column_text][gt3_spacing height=”39px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”The process involves the application of detailed, fine lines on the eyebrow area that effectively mimic the natural color and fine hairs that form the eyebrow.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:16px|text_align:left|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][gt3_spacing height=”16px”][vc_custom_heading text=”First, a fine scalpel or blade is used to make fine, microstroking incisions on the skin in a shape and form that has been predetermined by the microblading specialist and the client. Next, ink or dye is placed on the area that effectively soaks into the tiny incisions, creating a tattoo.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:16px|text_align:left|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”The brow microstroking tattoos are semi-permanent which means that while they won’t wash away easily, they will only last around 6 months before a reapplication becomes necessary.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:16px|text_align:left|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][gt3_spacing height=”16px”][vc_custom_heading text=”It is recommended not to get the eyebrow area wet for a couple of days after the procedure to ensure that the ink has a chance to settle and that it remains for longer. This means no washing the area or performing exercise or other activities that could cause sweating.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:16px|text_align:left|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][gt3_spacing height=”91px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1522222262826{margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://livewp.site/wp/md/browcraft/wp-content/uploads/sites/7/2018/03/img_services.jpg?id=2395) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][gt3_spacing height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1522315822552{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 20% !important;padding-left: 7.2% !important;background-color: #f4f6fa !important;}” offset=”vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][gt3_spacing height=”93px”][vc_custom_heading text=”WHAT WE OFFER” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:left|color:%23fb90b1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][vc_custom_heading text=”Benefits of Service” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23202020|line_height:1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][gt3_spacing height=”14px”][vc_single_image image=”2338″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1522222282232{margin-bottom: -7px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][gt3_spacing height=”13px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1520234747310{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Who benefits from microblading eyebrows manual hair technique? Anyone who can identify with one any one of the following:

  1. Poor vision or just cant see well to apply your makeup any
  2. Allergies to topical makeup or skin sensitivities
  3. An unsteady hand or poor motor skills due to Parkinsons disease, multiple sclerosis, arthritis, or stroke survivors.
  4. People with busy lifestyles and hectic work schedules who want to look their best all day long with out having to stop, check and re-apply their makeup due to smudging or smearing
[/vc_column_text][gt3_spacing height=”92px” responsive_es=”true” height_mobile=”0″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-5 vc_col-sm-offset-1 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1521725951686{padding-right: 12% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-color: #f4f6fa !important;}”][gt3_spacing height=”62px”][vc_custom_heading text=”PRICES” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:left|color:%23fb90b1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][vc_custom_heading text=”Choose Your Price” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23202020|line_height:1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”slideInUp”][gt3_spacing height=”16px”][vc_single_image image=”2338″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1522222299264{margin-bottom: -7px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1521109093248{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #e9ebf0 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1521109708312{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][gt3_spacing height=”15px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1521108732553{margin-bottom: 21px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

3d Microblading by Top Artist

Manual Technique with Natural Tint[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1521109718670{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][vc_custom_heading text=”$300″ font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36|text_align:right|color:%23fb90b1|line_height:30px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”slideInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1521189056235{margin-bottom: 1px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-left: 14% !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1521109099079{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #e9ebf0 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1521109725807{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][gt3_spacing height=”25px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1521108881210{margin-bottom: 21px !important;}”]

image=”2338″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1522222428277{margin-bottom: -7px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][gt3_spacing height=”19px”][vc_column_text]

Microblading is a semi-permanent eyebrow procedure that yields natural, crisp strokes that resemble hair. It is done by hand, using a very fine blade to deposit a small amount of ink into the skin. What our clients say about this procedure

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][gt3_spacing height=”33px” responsive_es=”true” height_mobile=”0″][vc_single_image image=”2350″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css_animation=”slideInLeft” css=”.vc_custom_1519637556075{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][gt3_spacing height=”16px”][gt3_testimonials auto_play_time=”4000″ posts_per_line=”3″ testimonilas_text_size=”16″ testimonilas_author_size=”18″ sign_color=”#202020″ img_width=”70″ img_height=”70″ view_type=””][gt3_testimonial_item tstm_author=”Alice Parker” tstm_author_position=”beauty expert” image=”2351″ select_rate=”none”]
